scripts.build: watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/booking/manage/main -o build/booking/manage/main.min.js -dv | watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/mobileApp/menuItems/main -o build/mobileApp/menuItems/main.min.js -dv
scripts.test: watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/test/test.js -o test/test.js -dv | mocha -w
scripts.build-test: npm run build | npm run test
scripts.deploy: watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/booking/manage/main.js -o ../../../../clubspeedapps/admin/www/js/react/build/booking/manage/main.min.js -v | watchify -t [reactify --es6] -t es6ify -t -g uglifyify src/mobileApp/menuItems/main.js -o ../../../../clubspeedapps/admin/www/js/react/build/mobileApp/menuItems/main.min.js -v
scripts.build-deploy: npm run build | npm run deploy
